content.detailedDescription:
Ships are flying repeatedly overhead.  i am using binoculars and can barely make out the ship configurations; i see at least two types of ships.  one like the battleship described in the video, this one was travelling very fast; estimate it to be going 4000mph at extreme altitude.  the other ships travel at a somewhat lower altitude and going about 1000 mph.

all have red/green and white lights that blink; thought i saw the color blue as well on another ship at my extreme west horizon.  a helicopter passed over my neighborhood with a vector heading south.


sorry no photos.  i need a telescope with camera otherwise it will be a bogus image.
content.summary: East west trajectory

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were both in bed and witnessed ufo's on two occasions within 1 month.  the first time my wife witnessed the orb in our bedroom.  i did not remember the experience but from her account i reached for the orb from a "dead sleep" and then the orb came gradually closer to my hand and then left through the wall.

on the second occurance, i saw the orb.  it came close to my wife's stomach.  she was awake and pregnant at the time.  it hovered for about two minutes.  i was counting the seconds in fear, but also in respect for what i was experiencing i did not move.  she was entranced but responded rapidly as it left through the wall.

during both experieces the orb hovered steadily near our television in the corner of the bedroom.  then it moved closer to my hand in the first experience and closer to my wife's stomach when she was pregnant.

our certainty of our experiences is absolute.  i knew that the first experience had occurred the next morning.  my wife was confident in what i saw and what she saw and felt on the second.

as erich von daniken described;  "the gods are with us" using the "chariots of the gods".  we are a function of their influence on the human race.  we need to understand this influence better to develop the means of contact and disolution of human fear.  we have the primordial right to understand our perveyors and what they mean to human society.  my experiences indicates to me that if we do not change our religiously based view on the "outerworld", we will fail ourselves on truth and technological opportunity.

j. scott kirkman
5387 hartfield ct.
ada, mi  49301
616-822-4016
content.summary: Orb enters bedroom and leaves through wall

content.detailedDescription:
Socorro strange flying objects

approximately 11:30 am, i arrived at home from work in socorro, nm. i had gone home to paint my garage floor during lunch. after talking to my wife she went outside to play with my 2 yr old son. within a few minutes she called me and i went outside to investigate. she pointed to an object in the sky. i looked up and saw what appeared to be a well defined globular object of a whitish color with a brightish tinge of bluish purple. at first i thought it must be a high altitude balloon or maybe a satellite. it appeared very distant but sizable and at first appeared to be hardly moving. its relative position was away from the sun with a clear sky and thus could be clearly seen almost directly east to ne.

at this point i ran back inside for a camera and took a picture using my personal phone camera. the object was strange enough to warrant further observation.

at this point i thought i���d better get it on tape, so i scrambled to find the camcorder, at this point hoping i would be quick enough to catch it when i got back.

no issue the object had planned to stick around!

i began taking footage with my camcorder, and notice that other similar objects also show up on the camcorder screen besides the one that was visible with the naked eye and would appear to go from a globe shape to a diamond shape (probably artifacts i thought).
at this point i wanted to know what it was so i grabbed my meade telescope. the object still stuck around, now at a position almost directly overhead but appeared to be far far away. my first observation when my telescope was focused on the object was that of what appeared to be a perfect sphere with a bluish purplish hue with what appeared to be perforations or little dots (imagine drawing a circle on paper and filling out the circle with dots). as far as i know this could have been a planet. however the telescope was removed from looking at the object and refocused several times from different positions in our backyard with the same result. 
we thought, well, strange object and stopped recording, since we already had it on tape and it didn���t do anything new; but continued using the telescope.
the object then transitioned to the sse within the next 10 minutes, but now at a faster rate than it was moving previously.

 

while i was looking at the object through the telescope, i saw a bright green flash in the scope and my wife yelled that the object had separated into two, what appeared to be identical objects. when i looked up from the scope, i saw now two, what appeared to be two almost identical objects moving in unison with each other.

 

my wife mentioned that during the separation there appeared to some kind of smoke trail and a long cylindrical object that fell earthwards in a wobbly pattern during the separation (i hope someone finds it, whatever it was).
 
when observed again in the telescope, the initial bluish purple hue, object was still there, but now seemed to have a smaller black object in front that obscured a portion of the purplish bluish sphere. 

 
the objects then appeared to transition together at a lower level across the sse to eastern horizon and now appeared even more distant and was no longer visible to the naked eye.

i am sure there is some logical explanation. one is that it may have been a weather balloon test; not to mention atmospheric turbulence and tricky sunlight.

times we saw the objects clearly visible: 11:35 am mountain time to 12:50 pm mountain time.

wish i had camera attachment on my telescope, this was the most amazing!

i have regular camera pics and over 13 minutes of video.

below are some stills from the captured video. video is too large to upload and is .Asp format and requires samsung dvc media to view.

other pictures from other cameras as well but here a few available ones.
content.summary: Object moved from ne and suddenly divides into separate objects as it transitions to the se. observed thru telescope and captured on camera & video.

content.detailedDescription:
2007-08-17 1995-05-10 it looked like a steath bomber ca, us
this incident occurred in oxnard, calif (ventura co.) by ventura rd. and w.Gonzales  rd. mothers day weekend in 1995. my friend steve and i stepped outside in the evening (10 pm) to smoke a cigarette when i thought i saw out if the northeast a white barn owl swoop from the top of our curb side tree...But it disappeared in the black sky??? puzzled and starring at the spot i saw no stars. as my eyes adjusted more to the crystal clear night sky the blank area grew in size till it filled a yard width chunk of sky? then a faint outline could be seen of this now to close (it made me reflectively duck) huge, slow moving silent boomerang shaped object. it now could be seen clearly with the stars twinkling all around it. the rear serrated edges (visually 2 inches) of this flying wing (b-2 bomber) were shaded in a lighter grayish color like cooling space shuttle tiles would look. it seemed to be moving 5 to 10 mph at 1000 ft. above the ground, heading southwest towards the ocean and the channel islands off shore. it filled the sky before us silently moving. we watched it for 5 mins. even climbing up on our second story roof top as it flew over us then over the strawberry and corn fields towards the sea. when we lost sight i immediately called pt. mugu air station knowing that it was the nearest operating radar station within 50 mile.Because i'm an ex air force air traffic radar controller once stationed 100 mile north at vandenberg afb lompoc, cal. they had seen no such contact on the radar screens. in after thought the owl i thought i saw was one of 3 advertising search light at a nearby car dealership 2 miles away and what i saw was the light hitting the curved surface (lower fuselage) under the left wing. we both went into the house and drew what we each saw without comments then compared them and i swear it looked like the b-2 bomber!!! i think it had been retrofitted with some type of alien technology to move silently and slow. also if you draw a reverse flight path from the channel islands ..Oxnard..Simi valley back you would end up at palmdale, ca and  edwards afb and if continued area 51 in nevada!
content.summary: Close huge slow silent moving b-2 stealth chevron boomerang shaped

content.detailedDescription: Im out working on a rig on galvan rd, me and my fellow co-workers(7 workers) have seen bright orange lights in packs of 2, 5, and 1 in the last 3 nights, finally we watched one tonight for about 4 minutes appearing and dissappearing across the sky staying in one place for about 13 seconds, then we noticed 3 planes with flashing lights chasing this object all across the sky, circling back and forth as if the ufo was playing with them. it would appear then they would chase it, then it would appear somewhere else. then finally we seen a swoop of the ufo with a bright white flash behind it swooping through the sky. more then one person seen this happen so something is going on. im from ohio and have never seen or believed in ufo's till tonight, i bet other people are seeing these groups of bright orange lights in the sky. email me back and let me know if you get any more reportings of this ,i'll keep an eye out. were gonna try to get a picture of this tommorow night because they show up every night around 830.Thanks
content.summary: Bright orange lights north of encinal, white swoop through air

content.detailedDescription:
i wasn't going to report this, but after reading somebodies post today, from wisconsin, i have to say i think i saw the same thing.



   last night i noticed an extra bright star in the sky and i grabbed my binoculars to take a look.  it was white, looked like a star, yet the way the light seemed to be reflecting off it was odd, it didnt look natural, more like a beam.. it wasnt going downwards, it was more like pointing across the sky, i have no idea what that means but it intrigued me to keep studying the object.  
   all of a sudden it started to jolt around, not moving far from its original spot, it shot around - up n down back n forth, and changed colors. blue and purple i saw for sure.  i shouted at my husband to come take a look, he took the binoculars and found the object, deeming it a star and handed them back to me.

  i looked through them again and studied the object hard, i could make no sense of it but i didnt think it was a star. it again repeated its actions in shooting around and i asked my husband "did you see what im seeing? cause this does not look like a star" he was like "what?" and i had him look again.  again he noted nothing special. i asked him if he saw the colors or it shooting around and he said he hadn't.
content.summary: Strange star in sky, same as wisconsin siting

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out my window and i saw two lights over wakiki i see them every day and they moved a cople miles west and then changed derictions to the east and dissapered and i found a stange skull like thing in my yard it was the size of my fist and a was made of some strage rock or bone or some thing that is all the rest is callsifeid
content.summary: I saw 2 srange lights over waikiki

content.detailedDescription:
When i took the dog out, i frequently look at the stars.  while in the front yard of our rural home, i noticed a very bright star at about 135 degrees (southeast) and about 20 degrees above the horizon.  sorry, my compass is malfunctioning, so my directions are approximate.  as an engineer, i'm fairly good at angles.

at first i thought it was a star, until i saw the color changes.  then i thought it might be an aircraft with landing lights on, though it was too high in the sky to be approaching any nearby airport.  other aircraft passed in the vicinity of the light during observation, and they were obviously aircraft.

the light was slightly larger than the brightest star in the sky at the time.  it changed colors, randomly changing white, blue, and red.  while other stars "twinkled" in their usual way, this light was brighter, more colorful, "flashed" instead of "twinkled" and it moved.  and by "flashed" i mean changed colors.  it did not turn on and off.

the movement was extremely erratic, sometimes moving slowly, sometimes jumping quickly from one spot to another.  the distance it moved would probably fit into a square inch had i held a ruler up at arm's length.  four people saw it and witnessed the movement and color changes.  the movement often was a sweeping arc, sometimes a straight line.  there was no pattern to the movement.

after an hour, the light appears to be moving with the star field.  when i am almost convinced it is a star or planet, it jumps around again.  none of the other stars or constellations exhibit this kind of movement.  i confirmed the object was moving by bracing myself against the house wall and watching as the object danced back and forth behind a tree maybe 200 feet away.  the wind is calm, and the object moved behind the main trunk of the tree (and back again), so i would claim that wind is not a factor.  the movement is also quite apparent in unobstructed sky without reference objects.  i observed the object from several vantage points near our property.  there are no clouds.  temperature is 16f.  winds calm.  no moon.  we are in rural wisconsin, and there are no cities in the direction of the light, so the sky is dark except for stars in that direction.  the two nearby towns cause glowing light in the sky only 5 or 10 degrees above the horizon and are ne and nw of here.

i don't have a camera sensitive enough to pick up this "star" and show its movement.  again, except for the movement and color changes, i would call it a star.

after referencing a star chart at skyviewcafe.Com, the light appears to be located close to a line between procyon and sirius and about a quarter of the way from procyon towards sirius.  i cannot place the light on a star chart directly.  it is not moving fast enough to be a satellite, yet seems to be moving with the starfield, so probably is not a geostationary bird.
content.summary: Erratically moving distant light in sky.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i wer sitting in the hot tub, that was located on back deck faceing the n. we wer just relaxing and talking and looking at the stars,when she said, what is that light thats comming from the n.? i looked at it for a bit an noticed it had a greenish glowing halo around it.Since it was aroind 4:00 a.M. i wondered if any one else was witnessing this.  when we first saw it, it was on the n.E. horizen,but after a min.Or so ,it was strait towrds us , heading due s,im sure ,it was a lot higher up than it appered to be, but it seemed to be so low.And this thing was huge.At least the size of a football field. when it was directly over us,the sky was iit up like the northern lights.It was outlined with white lights and was rectangular in shape,it had pulsating purple an pinkish lights in the center portion an a green glow all around it.We could hear popping an crackling sounds as it passed over us. we were speechless for afew seconds wile it went over the house,then we jumped from the tub,ran through the house,to the front deck,to the s. side.We watched as it continued to fly strait s. out of sight.We wer still stunned an speechless for a few min.We wer unsure what,if any thing,we should do. so we went to bed,but neather of us could stop talking about it, much less,sleep.About7:00 we flipped thrugh all the news chaneles, but heard nothing.We called nearly every one we knew, but no one had seen it,but weeks later,a friend said, he heard a desciption that sounded like our ufo,from a friend of his in ohio, about the same time we saw this one.We will nevwer for get about this,be fore that night,i was a non believer,not any more.........Mark mccartney  stillwater ok.
content.shape: Fireball,  Flash,  Square,  Rectagular,  Star-like,  Other
content.summary: We saw lights  comming from the north,so, we watched them until they passed over head  , and  cont.  south    out of  sight.

content.detailedDescription: We were traveling from tennessee to florida on a visiting trip to see family.  at 11pm we stopped at kissimmee, florida, to fill with gas and call the folks and let them know we woudld be there in an hour.  kissimmee was at that time 50 miles from melbourne on a mostly barren streth of straight road.  both my wife and i saw a shining flying disc coming approximately from the northeast heading towards ours vehicle, in which we were driving around 60mph.  the disc almost instantly approached our vehicle (a 68 camaro) and hovered steadily 3 or so feet above the hood for several minutes while we continued to drive.  the disc was many times the size of our vehicle and had a slight glow all around it.  after what seemed a few seconds, the disc silently flew away from us towards the southeast at an incredible speed with no audible sound.  my wife and looked at each other and simply asked asked eavh other if we saw that.  we both calmly agreed we had and spoke not another word about it.  the oddest thing about it all was we arrived in melbourne at 2am.  our relatives questioned us as to why we took so long to make the hour's drive, but we made no sensible excuse at the time,  nor did we speak of the incident ever again.  it's now 2008 and i still am haunted by dreams of my wife and i being carried around inside some strange craft.  i have no further memories regarding what may or not have occurred.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Sighted flyng object from north to south acrss direct field of moving vehicle

content.detailedDescription:
i was stopped at a stop sign and it was misting rain. i looked up and saw 3 objects at a telephone pole hovering at the transformer. they were of different colors, red blue and yellow. i couldn't believe what i was seeing so i stayed for about 4 minutes or better. they started to move down the line very slowly and then they sped down the lines at a speed i've never seen. i am not a quack but i do know what i saw. i have a degree in criminal law so this bothers me very much. i did not have a camera with me to take pictures i believe i could have because my presence didn't bother what ever it was.

thanks for your time and attention in this matter.

johnny
content.summary: i was stopped at a stop sign and seen 3 objects about 20 feet from me.

content.detailedDescription:
I have hesitated to report what i have seen for several reasons, the first being that at the time of the incident, i was still employed by a local law enforcement agency and i felt that going public with this might not be accepted by that agency in a positive way.  but after being encouraged by my friends and family i have finally decided to report what i witnessed.  i am now retired and don't really care how they might feel about it.
 
i think it's about time i reported a rather unusual event that happen a few years ago.  i observed what i know to be a ufo, being escorted by three military planes.  one low flying military jet, i believe to have been a wart hog, flying at about 1000 ft. off the deck, followed about two minutes later by an extremely large triangular shaped object, totally blacked out and totally silent.  that object was also flying at what i believe to be a very low altitude.  approximately two minutes later, two more military planes appeared from the same direction.  they were also flying as slow as possible, at the same altitude and direction as the first jet, and the ufo.
 
 
it was early fall, on a crystal clear and perfectly calm night. there was no moon out at that time. i was bow hunting in an area that i was very familiar with, just southwest of cascade idaho.  i had taken my four wheeler about a half mile from camp, to a high point along a logging road, a place we call phone point.  at that location we are able to get satisfactory reception for cell phone operation.  i had been sitting there for a few minutes, just taking in the crisp clean air, admiring the awesome view of the sky filled with what looked like a million stars.  i was listening to all the sounds of the high mountains and enjoying the moment as i waited until i could get a little better reception on my phone.  i then noticed, coming from the south, just over the tree tops, what appeared to be an a-10 wart hog.  it was flying at a very low speed and altitude; it looked as though it was barely going fast enough to stay in the air.  i could see it clearly as it passed almost directly overhead.  the plane appeared to be tilted back on its tail with the nose elevated and the engines sounded like they were running at an increased power level in order to maintain altitude.  it didn't look as though it was more than 800 to 1000 ft. off the ground, maybe even lower.  i remember watching it slowly continue north bound and remember looking at the rear engines and the roar from them, i could see the bright blue flame shooting from the exhaust ports.  i just sat there for a couple of minutes, wondering to myself what that was all about.  then, it came; i was still facing the same direction, south, sitting on my four wheeler.  i could see that against the star filled sky, a large area was beginning to just disappear; the stars were beginning to black out. 
in a huge triangular shape, with a point in the lead, the area being blacked out grew larger and larger.  blocking out over two thirds of the sky as it passed almost directly over my head.  i was stunned, to say the least.  although i look back on it now and i wonder why i wasn���t scared, but at the time i had no fear, just amazement and curiosity. 
  i could see, as it passed slowly overhead, the trailing edge of the huge triangular shape as the stars began to reappear.  it was so big, blocking out so much of the sky, i kept expecting to hear something, some engine sound, something, but it was totally silent.  from the overall size i knew it had to be close to the ground, it just was not reasonable for an object of that incredible size to be that close to the ground and not make any sort of noise.  not a sound of any kind, just a huge black triangular shaped object, directly overhead, moving very slowly.  no sound and no lights of any kind.  i kept thinking that i should be able to see some kind of engine exhaust, some kind of lights or sound, but nothing.  it then disappeared over the tree tops on the ridge to the north, just like the first jet.  again, i just sat there, thinking about what i had just seen.  i was going over and over it in my mind, i wanted to memorize the entire event.  i had been trained to do that in 20 years of law enforcement and i'm able to remember unusual events in most every detail possible.  then, just as suddenly as the first two objects, there appeared two more military jets, flying side by side.  they both also appeared to be a-10's.  both flying at very low altitude and very slowly, just like the first one.  they were following the exact same heading as the first jet and the black triangle shaped object.  in all three instances it took approximately 30 to 45 seconds for the objects to pass overhead.  i would estimate that the distance covered was approximately one half mile from the time they came into view until they disappeared over the ridge to the north.  
i sat there for several minutes, thinking about what had just happened.  i am positive of the facts as they occurred.  i have no explanation, but there are only a couple of possible scenarios as i see it.  to me, it's obvious that the military jets were an escort, one to lead and two to follow.  were they aware of the large triangular object in the middle, yes of course they were.  i guess the obvious question would be, was the object military or from some other source?  i seriously doubt that it was ours.  it was some sort of collaboration between the military and that other source, what ever or who ever it is.  this was nothing less than an amazing event that i will never forget; i hope this account of military participation will help shed some light on other unexplained sightings similar to this one.
content.summary: A huge, totally silent, totally blacked out triangle passed directly overhead at appromimatly 500 ft. being lead and followed by three military airplanes.

content.detailedDescription:
This event ocurred during a marine scout sniper training session at a night firing range on camp pendleton.  the date and time is approximate but could be confirmed exactly if government records are kept regarding training.

i don't remember the size of the class but at least 20-30 people were present during the training session.  marines who were shooting at the targets using star-light scopes began commenting and became excited about a ball of light hovering on the horizon.  i looked through a scope and you could see a bright light moving over the desert at low altitude.  it  went behind a mountain/hill in the background then reappeared through the valley.  the weird thing was when you looked without a scope you could see nothing, just darkness.  through the scope you saw an obvious bright light that was moving.  the distance is unknown but could be determined because the background was a mountain range and the light went around one of the mountains or larger hills beyond the firing range.  at the end the ball of light seemed to stop moving forward, rose higher above the mountains and then streaked up into the night sky at tremendous speed then was gone.  it reminded me of a shooting star in reverse.  again, nothing could be seen with the naked eye.  there was no sound of any kind.

i recall we had a gunnery sgt. from the phillipines.  he became very excited/upset and told everyone the incident would not be reported and we were not to speak about it.  he did not want to deal with the paper work. 

i have told many family and friends over the years about this incident and just wanted to document it here.  i can be contacted if any further information is required.
content.summary: Ball of light hovering along the desert; could be seen only with star-light scope

content.detailedDescription:
Just entering house looked up at good view of stars. saw constant bright white light very high up above level of air traffic of which there was a lot.
light travelled fairly slowly west to east.I assumed it was a meteor or something similar or maybe the space station but then it came to a stand still and reversed direction east to west without moving off its original line. watched light till it appeared to move up and out of sight. no flashing lights just the constant light. having seen a few unexplainable things in the sky before i got that tingle that this was not normal.
content.summary: Constant bright white light. very high travelling west east then stopped and reversed till out of viw

content.detailedDescription: I was waching t.V inside my house when i heard a anoying squekellike when irst turn on a old t.V. i ent out side with my dog rascal. i walked out to it it had the apperince of fire but i went up to touch it and it was slightly cold like steel that had been left in a freezer or in a snow storm. i than heard a very high frequncy sound that knocked me out. i woke up i my bad in my under wear as if i had gone to bed. i went to make coffe when i reached out to take the pitcher out of the coffe maker i noticed a very large purple and yellow bruise.The next day i went to see my sister who had recenty learned hypnosis. she put me under and she said i told her a tail of horror. they took sperm samples and did  reprouduction expeiments on me. they also implanted a chip in my heart. here is my e-mail address if you would like to talk to me personaly:jesstheshizz@yahoo.Com here also is my cell-phone # 573-247-3366
content.shape: Blimp,  Boomerang,  Bullet,  Missile,  Cigar,  Cone,  Chevron,  Circle,  Cross,  Cylinder,  Diamond,  Disc,  Egg,  Fireball,  Flash,  Oval,  Saturn-like,  Sphere,  Square,  Rectagular,  Star-like,  Teardrop,  Triangle,  Other

content.detailedDescription:
At this time i relized that i had no control of myself all i could move were my eyes. the next thing i remember was i was walking to this wooded bike trail area near my home. as i crossed a little bridge i knelt down on one knee. with two hands on my bent knee i peeked threw some trees and bushes and saw a craft of some type. it was ball shaped no lights and landed under these huge power lines. i never saw the craft from the outside fly. as i looked at the craft an opening opened up and two smaller than me being came out of the craft. the next thing i remember was that i was boarding the craft. as i walked onto the craft the two beings followed me in the craft. the craft was kind of cramped and dark. it was dark but you could see like a neon kind of darkness. i then bent down and asked the being where we are going. they answered me and said they are taking me behind the moon. i then asked why? they said they couldn't be detected on earths radar from there. i said ok then we took off. i looked out of some kind of window type thing and saw us leaving the earth. we passed the moon then made a u-turn type of turn back. this took less than 10 seconds. for some reason i wasn't scared at all. i actually acted like i knew them. the next thing i recall was the only time i was really scared. i woke up again, this time naked in a funnel shaped pool filled with a greenish black gel type liquid. 

i documented my story on youtube.Com/ufoabductee.
please contact me.
 there is much much more.
content.summary: I was abducted.

content.detailedDescription:
Dear oc mufon,

i am a member of your organization and have tried to email you at info@ocmufon.Org about this but received a message from the "postmaster" that this is not a valid email address.  so i apologize for inquiring in this form but really would like some answers.  this sighting was not my own, but i discovered it on abovetopsecret.Com today.  supposedly there was a major ufo event over the skies of oc in the early evening of 01/26/08 that was witnessed by many.  there has been no media coverage and the topic is currently being discussed on abovetopsecret.Com.  the original source is www.Americanchronicle.Com.  is this a big hoax?  i am especially interested because it is almost exactly like a sighting i had on 3/26/06 right here in my own backyard in irvine.  any info you can provide would be most helpful.  

thanks,
mary
content.summary: Two fireballs, maybe a small blue light also

content.detailedDescription: this is just an addition to my report because the second part did not load properly.
content.summary: As previously submitted

content.detailedDescription:
i came from the woodshed with an armload of wood before bed time at about 1:00 am on a clear fall night with moon shining and snow on the ground. there was no breese blowing. i was walking across my front lawn with the wood when a flash of light caught my eye. in front of me was an object which was all dark and moving at a walking pace or a little faster. there were no lights on it, but the moon was reflecting brightly off of its upper surface. i would estimate it to be about 30 or more feet in length. it was completely silent, not even the sound of moving air. i appeared to be about 100 feet or less from me and about 40 feet above the street. this is a rural area and there are only five houses on this quarter mile long street.
  my first reaction was that it was a flock of canada geese, but i should have heard honking or the sound of their wings, and they would have been moving faster. once i looked it, it immediately picked up speed and sped northward. i turned 90 degrees to my left, and it was moving away directly in front of me. it covered about one third of a mile before i lost sight of it in the night sky, it travelled that distance in about five seconds or less. as it sped away, i could see a very flat object about five times as wide as it was high.The outside edges on each side appeared to dip down slightly.
   i learned a few days later that my neighbour who was working a half mile from my location had seen a silver rectangular object mooving fast far above him on two different days in the daytime. his sightings were a few days before mine.
   as the object sped away, i was convinced that it was not a craft which the public is aware of, and i believe it was what we call an unidentified flying object.
   i was not alarmed, because ufo sightings in this area have been commom for over 30 years, and it was not the first one i have seen.
content.summary: Saw moonlight reflect off of a non illuminated silent object about 100 feet from me which was moving slowly at first.

content.detailedDescription:
Around 1am i was sitting on our porch with my friend and brother and we saw two lights due west of us about 60 degrees off the horizon. the other a few degrees north of due west. they which at first appeared to be stars but we noticed they were changing the color of their lights.Not much interest at this point. thinking they were planes we kept watching. the more noticeable of the pair was going dim followed by a greater intense brightness, comparable in brightness to stars in the big dipper. followed by dimness, and so forth. it's light was mostly blue and green. the other of the pair was mostly red and orange and also changing brightness. it began getting strange when the red one began moving erratically, in a squarish rising pattern towards the blue one. i figure planes cannot maneuver that quickly and change direction, yet still maintain speed. the blue one continued its dim/bright pattern. at this point i got binoculars. upon closer inspection the blue one was actually shifting between blue/green/red and the red one began moving towards us rapidly. when it was overhead i saw it clearly and it was shaped like a t, and flew overhead without sound, yet probably moving almost the speed of sound, yet compared to its earlier flight pattern i don't feel something like a harrier jet could rise so quickly, change directions and speed rapidly, then pass over without making a sound. it had flown east. after that one left we watched the blue one intently. it began going the opposite direction, further west of us, and disappeared completely from vision within about 4 seconds.

i talked to an astromoner and she said iridium flares were in the area, which are old motorola satellites.

at 2:45am i called one of the directors of the mufon in the area. he was pissed. if you have a sighting, i suggest not calling at the wee hours of the morning. i have learned that these people have full-time jobs and do not sit around staring at the sky with their hand on the phone ready to pick-up any call about a ufo sighting. which is what i was under the impression of.
content.summary: 3 star-shaped objects varying in intensity and color

content.detailedDescription: It was long ago when i was about seven... it seemed everything started to happen for me at that age. i never forgot that evening when my mother and i went for a walk. i didn't take many walks with her so this night seemed unusual already and i felt uneasy. i remember wondering why the neighborhood was so dark; it made the clear night sky seem closer since the stars were brighter but my observations were quickly interrupted when my mother grabbed my hand and pulled me toward the sumner school park, there in my hometown of claremont california. my confusion turned to fear when i saw a hovering black craft. i tried to stop my mom from taking me any further but her hand held on tight. she was very excited. she told me not to be scared. the lights of the park dimmed then flickered out completely. then i noticed three spheres of light dancing in the north-west sky. sometimes they darted, sometimes they hovered in place, one second they seemed very close while the next they seemed miles away. their size would increase or decrease depending on the directions they took. they were beautiful balls of light that would subtly change color. before i knew it, i was standing under the craft, frozen in fear and time. there was no sound... none at all... not from the craft or from the crickets we would usually hear. above me was a huge, triangular craft not unlike the f-117 stealth we have today but this craft didn't have any seams that i could tell, its corners were rounded off while the sides were straight across. it had three large, bright lights... one at each corner of its underside. the ufo just hung there at about the same height of a two-story house but it was so massive and i just a child that my size perception was no doubt off. without warning, sound, or movement of air, the ufo darted straight up then moved slowly to the west. the three spheres met up with it then together they all darted west and then north to the mountains, disappearing into the stars. i had mixed emotions standing there in shock. i don't know how long we were gone but i think it was about 15-20 minutes. our neighborhood had lost its electricity not long after we had left, my father said, and we didn't gain it back for a good 5-10 minutes after we got back home. my father, who worked for jpl at the time, told my mom and i not to repeat our story to anyone so i didn't. i don't even know if my mother remembers our encounter. though my fear went away, i continued to carry feelings of insecurity for a long time and i would have the same, strange, recurring dream, of aliens coming into my room, that still haunts me to this day. i continue to suffer from seizures, as does my father, and i still have eeg brain waves that continue to baffle neurologists. i have a bump behind my ear that doctors can't identify but have told me to leave alone saying if it's not bothering me then why bother with it. i am still searching for answers. i just want the truth whether of this world or not, and i finally  have this opportunity to tell others who might be able to piece the puzzle together.
content.summary: Not including the three glowing, darting spheres in the sky, i would have thought the ufo that hovered over my mother and me was an f-117 stealth though they did not exist at that time and the craft did not completly match the stealth we have today.

content.detailedDescription:
driving north on us-93 just south of hoover dam i wittnessed a cloud with a light inside of it. i stopped the car and started video taping. as i sat watching trying to figure out where the light was coming from i noticed a blue light hovering behind my car. i turned and looked and saw that the light changed its perspective of me every time i moved my head changing my perspective of it. i turned on the car and started driving franticly. i called my friends in vegas and told them of the situation.I also called 911. they had no troopers available in the area. the blue lights followed me to hoover dam. at the homeland security check-point i explained to the agent what was going on. he told me to move on.
  after passing through hoover dam i saw that the cloud with the light in it was on top of the hillside. driving on i reached a town called boulder. stopped at a light i saw that the cloud was on top of the next mountain. i stepped out of my car and while talking to my mother on my cell trying to get the cloud in focus, i noticed that the lights had reappeared behind my car with two small ships. there were what seemed to be beeings in a large window moving around watching me. my camera went dead. i got back in the car drove down to vegas. approaching my exit, 75, my rear passenger side tire blew out. waiting for the police to arrive i noticed that there was a cloud directly above my car. explaining to my mother the situation as it was happening the cloud seemingly was pulsating, waiting for me to exit the car. the police arrived. i changed the tire and went to the venetian hotel. 
  when i got into my room, i plugged in my camera and started watching the video. immediatly there were voices that i had not previously experienced. sitting in my room, i felt as if i was not alone. i left the room and went down to the casino. my phone rang, it was a man identifying himself as marty kay with the faa. he wanted to know my story. i asked him how he got my number. he said the police had contacted him. i told the story but would not let him know where i was staying. i went and got my video camera and had it placed in a hotel safe.
  i notified an agent from mufon, a mr. mark easter. he has kept in contact with me ever since. i had notified the local tv stations thinking it would be best if others saw this tape before the government made it or me disappear. i contacted friends and family all suggesting that i not let anyone touch or copy this tape. 
  i arrived at my final destination, huntington beach, ca. where a friend lives. the mufon people asked if they could make a copy of the tape. i had them sign a non-disclosure contract. they also took samples of my tire. it is apparent that something had scraped the outside of the tire until it blew. i kept the tire.
content.summary: Light inside of a mushroom shaped cloud. small bright lights followed my car. then two small ships flew beside my car

content.detailedDescription:
The date isnt exact but in mid-july of 2002, a friend and myself had snuck out of my parents house, a beautiful 38 acre horseriding farm located in west tisbury ma on the island of martha's vineyard, to enjoy our late night ciggarette.  est time of event 1-2 am.  our dedicated smoking spot was about 100 yards or so away from the house and happened to be a granite slab bench used as a mounting stone for riders.  we face away from the farmhouse as to not be discovered and were looking directly at the indoor riding ring (shaped like a giant t square, about 45 feet high, shown in image)we were almost done with our cigarettes when a light appeared as if on the other side of the riding indoor arena in the outdoor jumping arena.  at this point it seemed as if someone was sitting in a car behind the arena with its brights on, as we could see the haze of light hidden behind our barn.  just as we were about to investigate the angle of the light shining over the roof began changing as if the object projecting the light was rising.  all this time not a singe noise was heard.  the light had just reached over the apex of the roof when it instantly dissapeared.  in response to this stood up and walked backwards. never for a moment taking my eyes off the site of the event.  i remember not being able to sleep that night and to date retelling of the event still gives me goosebumps.  also on an unrelated topic, i've spent my life sailing wooden schooners around the waters of the cape and islands.  in the remote locations we anchor, we escape the haze of city lights and most of the time are in near complete star gazing conditions.  lets just say ive seen my fare share of zig zagging objects, light patterens and amazing meteor showers.  we believe  
   cpt brooke douglas
content.summary: Intense bright lights hovering behind barn.

The date isnt exact but in mid-july of 2002, a friend and myself had snuck out of my parents house, a beautiful 38 acre horseriding farm located in west tisbury ma on the island of martha's vineyard, to enjoy our late night ciggarette.  est time of event 1-2 am.  our dedicated smoking spot was about 100 yards or so away from the house and happened to be a granite slab bench used as a mounting stone for riders.  we face away from the farmhouse as to not be discovered and were looking directly at the indoor riding ring (shaped like a giant t square, about 45 feet high, shown in image)we were almost done with our cigarettes when a light appeared as if on the other side of the riding indoor arena in the outdoor jumping arena.  at this point it seemed as if someone was sitting in a car behind the arena with its brights on, as we could see the haze of light hidden behind our barn.  just as we were about to investigate the angle of the light shining over the roof began changing as if the object projecting the light was rising.  all this time not a singe noise was heard.  the light had just reached over the apex of the roof when it instantly dissapeared.  in response to this stood up and walked backwards. never for a moment taking my eyes off the site of the event.  i remember not being able to sleep that night and to date retelling of the event still gives me goosebumps.  also on an unrelated topic, i've spent my life sailing wooden schooners around the waters of the cape and islands.  in the remote locations we anchor, we escape the haze of city lights and most of the time are in near complete star gazing conditions.  lets just say ive seen my fare share of zig zagging objects, light patterens and amazing meteor showers.  we believe

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in the front yard of my parents house when i looked to the east and i noticed two, intensely bright, bluewhite, "dots" over old baldy, 50 miles east of malmstrom afb.  

these "dots" instantly accelerated in a westward trajectory and within one tenth of a second they were flying at about six or seven hundred feet off of the deck.  upon reaching malstrom these objects suddenly slowed down to about 10 knots and cruised down the river valley past the giants stadium where there was a ballgame in progress.  

as the objects reached the area where the anaconda smoke stack used to stand, they turned upward at a sharp angle, (about 70 degrees) and instantly accelerated to a point out in space.  i saw the light distort and stretch as they were gone very quickly.  it was as fast as the flash of a flashbulb.  bang!  they were gone.  the manager of the ballpark was filming a game and he caught them flying directly over his head on super 8mm.  it was shown on the news that night on kfbb.  i asked kfbb if they might have that footage and they said it was "misplaced".  yeah....I bet it was.  

i knew that these were intelligent flight paths, in perfect tandem formation, and a human could not withstand the acceleration changes that were occurring to these objects.  they weren't natural phenomenon and both objects were identical in size and shape.  

file 1: what i saw from my perspective
file 2: flight path map
file 3: what they looked like on television
content.summary: Bluewhite, intensely bright ovals (2) about the same size as a f-16

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking home from a friends house, down an empty country road, in northern nsw australia. my location was approximately 1- 2km north east of a small village called the channon. i do not recall the exact date, but it was in the first quarter of 1997, i think in february or march. it was a warm night, id say no earlier than 11.30pm. there where no clouds or moon in the sky, and the full majesty of the milky way was visible.

as i was walking, two bright green shining lights, which looked a pair of thin green slits, came into view from behind a hill on my left. i stopped walking and stood there watching them. when they first appeared, they looked like 2 green slits, so bright that many rays of green light emanated from them. but as i was watching them, they grew larger, in such a way that it looked two glowing green eyes opening in the dark. they remained stationary for around 20 to 30 seconds, in a position roughly 6 or 7 meters above the hill. from where i was standing, each 'eye' appeared to be around the same size and proportions as a typical flying saucer.

then, the glowing green eyes faded out of view, so i resumed my walk down the road. at no point during the observation did i hear any noise.

then, a few minutes later, from behind some tree tops to my right, appeared a brilliant white ball of light. the ufo looked like an incredibly bright star, like venus but much bigger and closer. when it first appeared, the moving star was so close, that looked almost as big as the moon. it was moving diagonally upwards and to the left, in a lazy and rough zig-zag path, quite slowly. there was still no noise (neither the green lights or the white light made any noise).

when it reached a point that was higher, and now in front of me, it then began to move at 180 degrees to the left, at around 150km/h. it traveled to the left only for a short distance, perhaps 60m, then it began doing a super-sonic somersault. it was spinning around at such a velocity, that it actually appeared as two objects, and it looked a lot like the astrological symbol for cancer. perhaps the object did split in two? its hard to say really.

this cancer symbol had a strange flicker to it. it was like a fluorescent bulb that was not operating correctly, and had began flickering, but accelerated many, many times. it was an irregular flicker, at a very high frequency, so that cancer sign looked like a complete object, but slightly blurred from the flickering. it was like a great medallion in the sky, it was truly an awesome sight to behold.

it spun and flickered as described, for around seven seconds, and then shot directly upwards. as it gained altitude it looked smaller and smaller, like a big shooting star travel straight up. it reminded me of a rocket, flying up into the sky, except much faster. as it got higher and smaller, it then looked like a star, and the only way to tell it apart from the real stars, was from the fact that it was moving.

also, as it was traveled upwards, a beam of light, much like a spot light, came out from the object, pointing straight upwards into the stars above. the stars that feel within the beam of light, seemed to be brighter than the stars around them. in the center of of the beam of light, there was a cluster of stars, which seemed to be brighter than even the other stars in the beam of light. the cluster of stars looked 3d, as if the beam of light was being used to magnify and brighten them. unfortunatley, i am unfamiliar with the constellations, so i am unable to say which cluster of stars was being highlighted.

when it was quite high, the spot light beam switched off, and the star like object stopped moving. it was high enough now that it was the same size as a star, and as soon as at stopped moving, it was camouflaged.
content.summary: Green lights like eyes, followed by a star like object doing a somersault, then flying directly upwards. (early 1997, northern nsw australia)

content.detailedDescription:
1st event: in 1966 my dad and i were in our backyard early to mid afternoon. 3-6 pm  about 1/2 to 1 mile up an object best described as a paper towel tube with portal holes down the side went  sailing by from south to north direction. made no sound and we watched it from horizon to horizon as it headed toward canada over lake erie. what was odd was that as soon as that one reached the horizon to vanish from site, another one appeared following the same path. in all 4 tube like objects passed in moments, in a straight line. seemed we were watching a tour of the land.

2nd event:  in 1990 i was coming home at about 12:30 at nite, thru what is called the fairveiw gravel pit. when i reached the stop sign to turn. there was an object sitting above the telephone pole in front of me. about 20 feet away and 20 feet off ground. i thought maybe a helicopter so i rolled the window down and no sound. so i stopped to look up at it. it then idled over me at 45 degree. the lights were on each side at the tip of what i'll call wings. and one light in front nose of object. the bottom had a 6 foot bubble that pulsated,but not see thru.As it idle over us,(girlfriend was with me), we watched in amazement. object was approx. 30 feet long and wide.And the backside looked just like the front so as looking at it, you didn't know if it was coming or going. it idled to the railroad tracks 50 feet away,and then idled down them 100 feet or more. we watched from the tracks and then continued on talking about it as we drove on. i turned around and went back looking for it again, but could not locate it. whether it took off, landed, or whatever, i do not know.
these are both actual and factual sightings. what or who drove the objects i do not know, wish i did. lol anyway, i contacted you that maybe these were reported by others in past, and may add more insite to those events for your info. i am adding a fast sketch of these objects. so contact me at given email and i would gladly answer any questions.
              wayne
content.summary: 2 different sightings and dates

content.detailedDescription: We were leaving our apartment, and right away i noticed a bright orange light in the western horizon. it was sort of shaped like a sideways teardrop, my partner thought it looked more saucer shaped. i said to my partner 'look at that." we were on our way somewhere and started walking down the street toward it. she looked and saw it as we walked west down the sidewalk. as we were walking i said i thought maybe it was a chemtrail. it wasnt.  it was bigger, lower in the sky and clearly not an airplane. we followed it for awhile, (it was moving quite slowly. it wasnt a cloud or a trick of the sun. we lost sight of it for a few minutes because we were heading downhill.  we thought maybe it was a comet, but it wasnt.  it was incredibly bright but not so bright you couldnt stare at it.  as we continued our walk, we lost sight of it and really tried to get to a place where we would see it. if it was a plane(which it wasnt) i think it would have still been visible in the sky considering how slow it seemed to be moving. we actually saw a plane and then it was really apparent that what we saw wasnt a plane.
content.summary: Bright orange saucer-shaped object in san francisco

content.detailedDescription: I was in the back yard letting my dog's out to go pottie. i saw a large triangle shaped, maybe three stories high, three rings of light one on each corner. at the bottom of the craft. it seemed to be glowing, or with an aura around it. no sound, and was traveling east. like a blimp would fly, slow and steady. the craft was traveling in an arc, not a straight line. after about an hour, i saw it again, going the same way. about ten miles to the north. at the time i didn't have a camera or a video cam. all i could do was to get my family out to see it...They were not interested ! it made my adrenaline shoot up. it was huge ! my guess was that it was one of ours, only not known to the public. as it was right over travis afb. i'm guessing again some kind of heavylift blimp thing. the craft flew past my line of sight, two sightings in one night, i thought it was amazing !!
content.summary: Saw it  hover over our town, on its way to travis afb, flying in an arc trajectory
